thread.title: Boys Soccer: Helias goes 1-1 at Rock Bridge Shootout
thread.title_full: Boys Soccer: Helias goes 1-1 at Rock Bridge Shootout

title: Boys Soccer: Helias goes 1-1 at Rock Bridge Shootout
text:
COLUMBIA, Mo. — The Helias Crusaders split two games in the Rock Bridge Shootout over the weekend, losing 5-0 to Francis Howell Central and beating Blue Springs 4-1. 
Friday, Ben Mitan set a school record with 15 saves in the loss to Francis Howell Central. 
Braden Remmert had a hat trick in the Crusaders’ win Saturday against Blue Springs. Nick Brandt had a goal and an assist, and Sam Heckart had an assist as well. 
The top-seeded Crusaders (13-10) begin district play against Union at 4:30 p.m. Oct. 27 in Camdenton. ﻿
